description: Vegan Mac and Cheese Taco Bake with Walnut Taco Meat and Vegan Cashew Queso combines two family favorites into one epic vegan casserole that comes together quickly! Make it tonight.
keywords: taco mac and cheese, vegan taco casserole, vegan taco mac bake
name: Vegan Taco Mac and Cheese Bake
recipeIngredient: 3 tbsp sundried tomato packed in olive oil (or 1 tbsp tomato paste)
2 tsp chili powder blend (I use chipotle powder chili blend, which a lot more flavor of the chipotle chili)
3/4 cup of raw cashews soaked in hot water for at least 15 minutes
1/2 tsp Chipotle pepper flakes or chipotle pepper powder
2 cups elbows or mac or other pasta
1/2 cup chopped tomatoes or fresh salsa

recipeInstructions.text: Add the walnuts to a food processor, and process until the mixture resembles bread crumbs.
Add in the rest of the ingredients and process until the mixture is homogeneously combined and there are no whole chickpeas remaining, but it still has texture.
Transfer the mixture to a bowl, and taste and adjust flavor. If the mixture is too dry add in a tsp or so of oil, or lime juice, and mix in.
